price: (Akaambiwa:) Piga-piga ardhi kwa mguu wako! Basi haya maji baridi ya kuogea na ya kunywa.
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ
footnotes: Tukamuitikia na tukamwambia: Ipige ardhi kwa mguu wako, yatatimbuka maji baridi, utakoga na utakunywa hayo, na kwa hivyo yatakuondokea machofu na adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
